page.title: 16A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SARAH.
page.content: I GET UP AT ABOUT 7.30. I GET WASHED, DRESSED AND MAKE MY BED. THEN I GO DOWN AND HAVE MY BREAKFAST. I NORMALLY HAVE TOAST AND FRY AND A CUP OF TEA. AFTER BREAKFAST I GO AND WASH. I DO MY PIANO PRACTICE FOR HALF AN HOUR. IF I HAVE TIME I WATCH BREAKFAST TIME ON THE T.V. AT 8.45 I LEAVE FOR SCHOOL. AT 9.00 WE HAVE AN ASSEMBLY. NEXT WE DO MATHS. AT 10.40 WE HAVE BREAK. WE PLAY IN THE PLAYGROUND OR ON THE SCHOOL FIELD. WE DO SOME ENGLISH AFTER PLAY. AT 12.00 IT IS DINNER TIME. I HELP TO SERVE. AT 1.00 WE HAVE ANOTHER PLAYTIME. AT 1.30 WE COME IN. WE PLAY ON THE COMPUTER AND PLAY CHESS. AT 2.30 WE HAVE A BREAK. THEN WE DRAW PICTURES AND READ. AT 3.30 WE GO HOME. I WATCH THE TV AND HAVE SOMETHING TO EAT. SOMETIMES I PLAY OUTSIDE IN MY CAMP. I HAVE SOME TEA AND READ MY BOOK. I GO TO BED AT 9.00.
